description:
The true mission of the Bounts is disclosed by Jin Kariya during a burly fight with Ichigo.  Kariya explains the origin of the Bounts and their plan to destroy the Soul Society.  As their brawl advances, Ichigo`s Getsugatensho is proven useless as his very own Zanpakuto is turned against him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinigami and Quincy, the Reviving Power
Shinigami et Quincy, les pouvoirs retrouvés !
死神とクインシー, よみがえる力
